thread.title: Compliancy Group Presenting In BlogHIPAA’s Must-See Webinar: "New Revenue Streams For MSPs and Business Associates"
thread.title_full: Compliancy Group Presenting In BlogHIPAA’s Must-See Webinar: "New Revenue Streams For MSPs and Business Associates"

author: prbuzz.com
title: Compliancy Group Presenting In BlogHIPAA’s Must-See Webinar: "New Revenue Streams For MSPs and Business Associates"
text:
New Revenue Streams For MSPs and Business Associates
Huntington, NY—September 22,2015—Compliancy Group, LLC, creators of the cloud-based compliance tracking solution, The Guard, will be presenting along a panel of industry experts in an upcoming webinar, “Compliance as a Service—New revenue streams for MSPs and Business Associates.” This special webinar hosted by BlogHIPAA (your number one source for news, ideas, and everything HIPAA) will discuss key tools to use in expanding your portfolio of offerings to clients.
You’ll walk away with:
· Ideas for providing value to your clients
· Ways to simplify compliance
· How to help clients protect data
· How to make your MSP Stratospherically Successful
· Solutions for encryption as a service
· Solutions for compliance as a service
· The importance of a Culture of Compliance
· Best practices to accelerate your business
The panel of experts will present on how you can differentiate your company, increase revenue and client loyalty by offering “Compliance as a Service” to your healthcare clients. By offering Compliance-as-a-Service, MSPs and Business Associates can quickly become compliant and help their clients save time, money, and effort. Compliancy Group’s The Guard, as the only end-to-end compliance solution (CaaS) with a white-labeled offering, empowers you to offer new services while adding a highly profitable and recurring revenue stream.
“MSPs are in the ideal position to address their client’s critical regulatory challenges by offering compliance-as-a-service (CaaS). MSPs as the trusted provider can leverage the existing relationship to offer new services that solve the client’s critical needs while adding recurring and highly profitable new revenue streams.” – Marc Haskelson (President & CEO of Compliancy Group)
The panel of speakers for this webinar will include: Andy Nieto (Health IT Strategist at DataMotion), Marc Haskelson (President & CEO of Compliancy Group), Stuart Crawford (Founder & CEO, Ulistic Inc.) and Jon Matero (President/CEO, Network Heroes).
This special webinar will be hosted on Thursday, September 24th at 2:00 PM EST. Space is limited, so sign up now! To register visit http://bloghipaa.com/compliance-as-a-service-new-revenue-streams-for-msps-and-business-associates/
About Compliancy Group, LLC
Compliancy Group allows anyone to simplify the challenge of compliance, whether they are an experienced compliance expert or a practice manager. Created by HIPAA auditors, The Guard is a simple, cost-effective, and cloud-based that addresses every aspect of compliance. Our proprietary Achieve, Illustrate, and Maintain methodology with Compliance Coach support helps to address the entire set of HIPAA, HITECH, Omnibus, and PCI regulations. Visit www.compliancy-group.com or contact us at 855.854.4722 (855 85 HIPAA) to learn how simple compliance can be.
